channel.title: Fire and Ice Mafia - Fire Mafia Wins! (2/13 Alive)
channel.description:
# Welcome to [color=#FF0000]F[/color][color=#F51114]i[/color][color=#EB2229]r[/color][color=#E1333E]e[/color] [color=#CD5568]a[/color][color=#C3677C]n[/color][color=#B97891]d[/color] [color=#A59ABB]I[/color][color=#9BABD0]c[/color][color=#91BCE5]e[/color] Mafia!
This is a multiball mafia setup where two individual mafia teams try to take control of the town, and get rid of the other. (Since turbo formats require me to be more active, we're doing this instead :stuck_out_tongue:) ## Mechanics • Days last 72 hours, and nights last 24 hours. • Lynch is majority, and there is a day one lynch (no lynch is an option). • Both mafia teams have a day and night chat. • If both mafia teams target the same person, neither will successfully kill them. • It is made clear on a death which mafia team was responsible for killing the player. ## Rolelist **[color=red]Fire Mafia Goon[/color]** **[color=red]Fire Mafia Goon[/color]** **[color=lightskyblue]Ice Mafia Goon[/color]** **[color=lightskyblue]Ice Mafia Goon[/color]** **[color=lime]Doctor[/color]** **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** ## Role Cards > ## [color=red]Fire Mafia Goon[/color] > **Factional Kill (Night)** - Each night phase, one of you or your partner may perform the factional kill. *You win when the other mafia team is eliminated and you control 50% of the town or nothing can prevent this from occurring.* > ## [color=lightskyblue]Ice Mafia Goon[/color] > **Factional Kill (Night)** - Each night phase, one of you or your partner may perform the factional kill. *You win when the other mafia team is eliminated and you control 50% of the town or nothing can prevent this from occurring.* > ## [color=lime]Doctor[/color] > **Heal (Night)** - Each night phase, you may protect one player other than yourself in the game from being nightkilled. *You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.* > ## [color=lime]Citizen[/color] > Your weapon is your vote. You have no night actions. *You win when all threats to the town have been eliminated and there is at least one town player alive.* ## Player List & Graveyard 1. Firekitten - Died N3 - **[color=lime]Doctor[/color]** 2. Icibalus - Lived - **[color=red]Fire Mafia Goon[/color]** 3. Memesky - Died D4 - **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** 4. Marluxion - Died N4 - **[color=red]Fire Mafia Goon[/color]** 5. MaximusPrime - Died N3 - **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** 6. MtheJoker - Died N2 - **[color=lightblue]Ice Mafia Goon[/color]** 7. Celeste_Ludenberg - Died N1 - **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** 8. htm - Died N4 - **[color=lightblue]Ice Mafia Goon[/color]** 9. Sam17z - Died D1 - **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** 10. Parfait - Died D2 - **[color=lime]Super Secret Jester[/color]** 11. ~~Pug~~ > Livicus - Died D3 - **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** 12. Eevee - Died N1 - **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]** 13. Vulgard - Lived - **[color=lime]Citizen[/color]**
